installing packages
```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("RSQLite")
```

loading libraries
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("RSQLite")
```

creating database connection
```{r}
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "database.sqlite")
```
